Air Force Basic Training 326 Bulldogs Graduation Card

Big Deals! Air Force Basic Training 326 Bulldogs Graduation Card – Graduation Cards Popular Air Force Basic Training 326 Bulldogs Graduation Card It’s a great choice Air Force Basic Training 326 Bulldogs Graduation Card You can order itThis Air Force Basic Training 326 Bulldogs mascot design is a unique & special BMT Graduation card that you can personalize just for you new Airman! Customize rank, last name, grad date, TRS / FLT flight ###, funny “MOM” muscle heart tattoo, and your relationship to your graduate on the “Love your proud Air Force ‘Family – Mom & Dad – Friends, names – pets name’)” monogram on the back side. Navy Blue is the official color of the 326th Training Squadron! * 2 Purchase options: 1) Zazzle print + envelope shipped right to your door 2) Instant digital download file to print yourself and use your own A7 size envelope. As a Air Force Mom (my son is a recent F-16 Jet Crew Chief vet), I fully understand the process of missing your child and getting ready for the excitement of graduation days. These card were created for my Airman when he graduated, and now they are available to personalize for your brave loved ones graduating at Lackland AFB! All 9 TRS mascots are available in my Zazzle store – your trainee’s ### TRS / FLT ### is found in the second line of their JBSA Lackland mailing address. Be sure to also check out the matching privacy envelope liner set as well! See all the invitations / encouragement cards for the 7.5 weeks of basic training, grad cards, vinyl graduation banners and gear, and much more, available in my store by clicking the blue “by FigLilyCo” in the upper right hand corner of this screen. Custom design requests or questions are always welcome – [email protected]. From this proud AF family to you and yours, we send our blessings and sincere THANKS for the service, courage, and sacrifice of your soon-to-be US Airman HUA!! Price:$4.17
